creator: Offroad Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Welcome To Real “Cargo Tractor Trolley Simulator Game”. Tractor usage in present era seems quite unique but interesting. Driving tractor trolley is really different and unique and when it is offroad driving then it becomes very challenging. This is best freight transport game 2019. Enjoy spectacular driving control in this offroad heavy truck driving game.
Be a responsible tractor trolley driver and drive heavy-duty cargo along narrow ridges. Track is dangerous and uneven so drive diligently. Climb the high mountain and pass through bumpy patches without losing cargo. Move cargo including wood logs, cylinders, machinery, stones etc. inside tractor trailer at final point within prescribed time.
There is variety of tractors, trailers. Trucks, jeeps and other vehicles. Unlock them by completing missions. For right direction, follow the arrows present along the path. This is best tractor chlanay wali game in beautiful environment. Enjoy ride in fresh, fascinating and alluring atmosphere environment and natural surroundings with realistic sounds of engine and sweet chirping of birds.
Drive wood cargo truck diligently through bridges and offroad terrains. In this tractor farming game you are designated as driver to transport cargo. There is risk of fall down from steep hills so be careful. Tractors are uses in this game for transportation duty not for farming purpose. You will know the life of a farmer and get close to natural environment in “Cargo Tractor Trolley Simulator Game”.
Multiple control options are available either steering, arrows or tilt option. To reverse or stop heavy cargo truck, tap brake button and to speed up use forward button. Enjoy interesting levels and drop cargo at final point without dropping it in way. Also park the truck in particular place to complete the task. Hit the play button and get ready to play tractor wala game 2019.
Features:
• Natural Environment
• Multiple camera angles
• Offline play
• Variety of tractors and other vehicles
• Awesome graphics
• Realistic sounds
• Advanced cargo physics
• Alluring atmosphere
• Addictive mission
• Well-designed offroad environment

• Press Race/Forward & Reverse/Backward Button To Move Vehicle In Forward Or
Backward Direction

Control.

By playing this trektor trali wali game, you get close to the nature and natural environment of hill rural areas. You will know how is like to be farmer. How things works in a village life.

About Our Company: Offroad Games Studio
A Gaming Studio with the team of highly motivated team try to deliver games you like. Previously we deliver successful games you people like. One of them is “Future Cargo Truck Driving Simulator: Hill Driver“ and “Tractor Simulator Farming Game” and “The Ship Simulator 2022”.
Our Company Believes in providing addictive ideas based games.
So what you are waiting for. Just click the install button and download it now. Download this tractor offroad hill simulator game offered by offroad games studio. Your suggestions and feedback matters a lot for us for our Cargo Tractor Trolley Simulator Game.
